item.title: Proclamation Honoring the Victims of the Tragedy in Minneapolis, Minnesota
item.description: A proclamation issued by the President of the United States to honor and remember the victims of the violence that occurred on August 27, 2025, in Minneapolis, Minnesota. The proclamation asserts the authority of the President under the Constitution and laws of the United States and designates this occasion as a mark of respect for those affected by the incident.
